code: import axios from"axios";var instance=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost/api/v1/"});export var authAPI={registration:function registration(data){return instance.post('users/registration',data);},me:function me(token){return instance.get('users/me',{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});},login:function login(mail,password){return instance.post('users/login',{mail:mail,password:password});}};export var usersAPI={create:function create(data,token){return instance.post('users',data,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});},getPage:function getPage(size,page,token){return instance.get("users?size=".concat(size,"&page=").concat(page),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});},getPageDef:function getPageDef(token){return instance.get("users",{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});},getCard:function getCard(uuid,token){return instance.get("users/".concat(uuid),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});},update:function update(uuid,dt_update,token,data){return instance.put("users/".concat(uuid,"/dt_update/").concat(dt_update),data,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});}};
